title: Hex Chests
body: I have not received a chest in a bit.  My understanding is I can only recieve so many chests per champ per season is this correct?  Is there a way to see what Champs already earned a chest?

replies.body:
There is! If you go to your profile and check your Champions page, you'll see a gold border around champions you've already earned a chest on. For quick reference, this is what it will look like:

[Chest earned](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/203324076/Chest-Earned.jpg)
[Chest not earned](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/203457893/Chest-Not-Earned.jpg)

Feel free to check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info too!
If my premade teammate earns an S, does that count as a chest on the champ I played?
i think so. Some of my champs with gold borders have A's as the highest listed ranking so far this season
